source.oracleReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM SINGHA.GENERATE_TARGET WHERE KEY_DATE= TO_DATE('2020-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select SUM(cast(value as int))
as CNT_TGT from STRING_SPLIT
(SUBSTRING(''',
variables('V_COUNT_EACH_TARGET'),'''
, 2, LEN(''',
variables('V_COUNT_EACH_TARGET'),'''
)-2) , '','' )  ')

P_SOURCE_CNT_STMT.defaultValue: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT  FROM PROVINCE_PROFILE.T_PROVINCE_PROFILE_TRANSACTION_MODEL  WHERE CAST(DATE AS DATE) IN  (SELECT DISTINCT DATE AS BUS_DATE FROM PROVINCE_PROFILE.T_PROVINCE_PROFILE_TRANSACTION_MODEL  WHERE CAST(ASAT_DT AS DATE) = CAST('2020-06-28' AS DATE))

P_RMRK.value: PREVIOUS CYCLE PROCESS DID NOT COMPLETE
